name: Nightstalkers
description:
Nightstalkers (First Blood) is a 2D action-platformer video game. Players control a woodsman who must defeat the Nosferatu who has kidnapped his bride for a snack.

Control Scheme (Keyboard)

Movement – ASD or Arrow Keys

Jumping – X/K

Melee Attack – C/J

Switch Sub Weapon – Z/L Pause – Escape

If you enjoy this game do not forget to vote, share and give feedback. They are always welcomed!

 Enjoy the soundtracks? Check out the music composers’ pages:

Druox the shredder

https://soundcloud.com/dreux-ferrano-jr/tracks

 John Montoya

https://linktr.ee/jlmcomposer

 Feeling generous? Consider donating some bucks for the game developer.

Have a good gaming moment!
